text: Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God Moses mɨkemezɨ moghɨra, me gɨn asɨziba bar isia mɨghɨrir ofa gamir dakozim isa, God bativamin Purirpenimɨn tiar akamɨn boroghɨn azenan anetɨ. Egha ofa gamir dakozir kamɨn, Moses dughiar kamra ofan mɨn asɨziba tue da bar isia mɨghɨri. Egha uaghan witɨn plaua inigha ofan mɨn da tue.
